org.apache.flink.api.common.accumulators

接口 SimpleAccumulator<T extends Serializable>

  • 所有超级接口:
    Accumulator<T,T>, Cloneable, Serializable
    所有已知实现类:
    AverageAccumulator, DoubleCounter, DoubleMaximum, DoubleMinimum, IntCounter, IntMaximum, IntMinimum, LongCounter, LongMaximum, LongMinimum

    @Public
public interface SimpleAccumulator<T extends Serializable>
extends Accumulator<T,T>
    Similar to Accumulator, but the type of items to add and the result value must be the same.

    • 方法概要

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.flink.api.common.accumulators.Accumulator

        add, clone, getLocalValue, merge, resetLocal
